original_title: DOCUMENTARY of AKB48 Show must go on 少女たちは傷つきながら、夢を見る
overview: Documentary Of AKB48 : Show Must Go On is the 2nd AKB48 documentary. The movie feature various moments of 2011, such as Team 4 formation, Maeda Atsuko winning the 3rd Senbatsu Election, first dome concert in Seibu Dome and the Dareka no Tame ni Charity Project.
title: Documentary of AKB48 Show Must Go On
